CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Flash Newspicture Magazine, February 21, 1938, pg. 17, reads: "Formerly the Iron City Elks, now the Pittsburgh Flashes, one of the strongest court aggregations in west."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Flash basketball team, possibly including Charles "Teenie" Harris squatting on left, #2 Red Dorman, and #1 Charley Heard
